titleStmt.title: Death disarmed: the grave buried: or, The Christians future triumph through Christ over death, and the grave. Delivered in a sermon at the interrment of Mr. Henry English; at Salerst in the county of Sussex. Decemb. 10. MDCXLIX. By Iohn Bradshavv Mr. of Arts, preacher of Etchingham.
titleStmt.author: Bradshaw, John, 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Constable, for Henry Shepheard, and are to be sold at the sign of the Bible on Tower-hill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Bible on Tower-hill
